message: I propose we split the money 90/10, with me getting the larger share. This is a fair starting point, considering the inflation will benefit you more in the later rounds.
I think a 60/40 split is more fair, considering the inflation will impact me more in the following rounds. Let's work together to find a solution that benefits us both.

I'm willing to compromise, but a 70/30 split is still more fair considering the inflation will continue to impact you more heavily in the future rounds. Let's reach a deal before the money depreciates further.
